description: My place is close to Brooklyn Heights Promenade, Iron Chef House, Vineapple, Clark's Restaurant, Montague Street, Cadman Plaza Park. You’ll love my place because of its excellent location, beautiful building, and comfortable couch and bed! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Beautiful Brooklyn Heights Studio Apartment
review: Andrew was great and the location is really great for the price. The pictures appropriate depict the actual living space. The living space doesn't get a lot of natural light though--which you can see from the pics as well. Overall, it was good experience since my work was only a station away.
